targets.query: SELECT count(distinct("uid")) FROM /^$sourcedb$/ WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "country"
SELECT sum("service_total") AS "Total", sum("service_active") AS "Active" FROM /^$sourcedb$/ WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT "containers" FROM "projects" WHERE "id" = ''AND "orchestration" != '' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "orchestration"
